official_title: A bill to provide that William C. King may occupy certain land in Coronado National Forest, Arizona, which is subject to a placer mining claim.

summary.text: Provides that William C. King may occupy certain land in Coronado National Forest, Arizona, which is subject to a placer mining claim.

titles.title: A bill to provide that William C. King may occupy certain land in Coronado National Forest, Arizona, which is subject to a placer mining claim.
